mapper.sql: SELECT II.STD_CTG_NO /* prStdCtgEvltItemInfo.stdCtgEvltItemListBase */ , II.EVLT_ITEM_NO , IC.EVLT_ITEM_NM , II.SORT_SEQ , II.SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(II.SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , II.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(II.SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_STD_CTG_EVLT_ITEM_INFO II , PR_EVLT_ITEM_CD IC WHERE 1 = 1 AND II.EVLT_ITEM_NO = IC.EVLT_ITEM_NO AND II.STD_CTG_NO = #{stdCtgNo} ORDER BY SORT_SEQ
mapper.select: SELECT /* prStdCtgEvltItemInfo.checkEvltItemMappingStdCtg */ CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END RESULT FROM PR_STD_CTG_EVLT_ITEM_INFO WHERE EVLT_ITEM_NO = #{evltItemNo}

SELECT (SELECT STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG WHERE STD_CTG_NO = SC.STD_LRG_CTG_NO ) /* prStdCtgEvltItemInfo.getMappingStdCtgList */ || COALESCE( (SELECT '>' || STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG WHERE STD_CTG_NO = SC.STD_MID_CTG_NO) , '') || COALESCE( (SELECT '>' || STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG WHERE STD_CTG_NO = SC.STD_SML_CTG_NO) , '') || COALESCE( (SELECT '>' || STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG WHERE STD_CTG_NO = SC.STD_THN_CTG_NO) , '') AS STD_CTG_HIERARCHY FROM PR_STD_CTG_EVLT_ITEM_INFO II , PR_STD_CTG SC WHERE 1 = 1 AND SC.STD_CTG_NO = II.STD_CTG_NO AND II.EVLT_ITEM_NO = #{evltItemNo}
